title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/voom-williams.html
notes:
Join Scamorama for a terrifying glimpse into the world of the worshippers of Cha, courtesy of Father Martin Voom, who recruits a scammer into the fold.

	So, there's this woman -- Tina Williams. Her mom died when she was five, and her dad got killed by her uncle and she's got this inheritance and... well, you know the rest. Anyway, Father Martin Voom, a priest for the Holy Order of Nakkara, is a generous man and wants to help.


Of course, Tina is a scammer. But Father Voom isn't exactly a saint either; the Order of Nakkara is a cult devoted to the Cha; a race of dragon-like dark gods that require human breeding vessels.


And Tina is Father Voom's next target.

Text of conversion form:
CHURCH OF THE HOLY ORDER OF NAKKARA
THIS AGREEMENT OF CONVERSION (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") made and entered into this day of _________, 2010, by and between The Church of the Holy Order of Nakkara (hereinafter referred to as "Church") and _________________________________ (hereinafter referred to as "Convert").

WITNESSETH:

WHEREAS, Church is desirous of accepting Convert for legal guardianship upon the terms and conditions as contained herein; and is desirous of leasing the Housing from Church on the terms and conditions as contained herein;

NOW, THEREFORE, the parties hereto hereby agree as follows:

1. TERM. Church leases to Convert and Convert leases from Church the above described Premises together with any and all appurtenances thereto, for a term decided by Church.

2. DEVOTION. Convert will renounce belief in physical death, and accept the reality of the Cha. Convert will agree to practice devotion to the Cha.

3. USE OF PREMISES. The Premises shall be used and occupied by Convert exclusively, as a private single family dwelling, and no part of the Premises shall be used at any time during the term of this Agreement by Convert for the purpose of carrying on any business, profession, or trade of any kind, or for any purpose other than as a private single family dwelling. Convert shall not allow any other person, other than Convert's immediate family or transient relatives and friends who are guests of Convert, to use or occupy the Premises without first obtaining Church's written consent to such use. Convert shall comply with any and all laws, ordinances, rules and orders of any and all governmental or quasi-governmental authorities affecting the cleanliness, use, occupancy and preservation of the Premises.

4. RITUALS. Convert will surrender both body and soul to the Cha, including, but not limited to, the use of Convertfs reproductive system to gestate the spawn of the Cha. Church will not be held responsible for physical or psychological damage related to pregnancy with inhuman offspring.

5. AESTHETIC PREFERENCE. Convert will forgo previous aesthetic preferences, and adopt those favored by Church. Convert may wear only black or dark-colored clothing, and listen only to music selected by Church.

6. FINAL AGREEMENT. Church agrees to help in any way possible with transfer of inheritance related funds, and help in the process of acquiring U.S. citizenship for Convert.

_______________________________

Convert Signature

By signing the above, I agree to all aforementioned terms and conditions

TINA WILLIAMS



1/5/11


My Father ,


How are you ? See bellow what Aggie wrote ..


So, Father Voom told you I've been sabotaging the payments? I already told him, I'm not the one doing the sabotaging! I do know it is someone within the Church, someone I'm... close to. But even though I am not preventing Father Voom from making your payments, I have done my research



Tina ..

messages.body:
Dearest one,


How was your day, I hope fine? it is my great desire of going into business and parental relationship with you. I am quite aware that my message will come to you as a surprise because is indeed very strange for someone you have not met before to contact you in this regard. My name is Tina Williams , from London , England the only Daughter of late Frank Williams. He died mysteriously in France during one of his business trips Abroad . Though his sudden death was linked or rather suspected to have been master-minded by a brother of his who traveled with him at that time. But God knows the truth! My mother died when I was just 5 years old, and since then my father took me so special.



Before his death 2008 he called the secretary who accompanied him to the hospital and told her that he had a sum of USD 4,800,000.00 million American Dollars and the money is in the custody of LLOYDS TSB BANK London here in England .


Now there is a trace that it is my uncle that kill him, couple with what he did to me recently so I decided to ran away from our family house to where I am now because he wanted to kill me too to take all the properties. Without knowing that there is this Money deposited in the Lloyds Tsb Bank in this country. I contacted you so that you will help me and see that this money is transferred to you as my guardian so that you will help me to invest and for me to continued my studies. I want you to assist me in clearing this fund into your account overseas as a beneficiary of the fund, and also use it for an investment purpose. I am just 20 years old and high school certificate holder; really don't know what to do.


Now I want an account overseas where I can transfer these funds. This is because I have suffered a lot of set backs as a result of incessant political crisis here in London. The death of my father actually brought sorrow to my life. I need someone to be my Guardian in life that I will look on to as my parents.Once the money is transferred, you will make arrangement for me to come over to you. Please can you be trusted? Do not be offended because of these question of mine. I am just serious to know more about you, because it is risk for me.Can you honestly help me as your daughter? Can you serve as a guardian of this fund since I am only 20 years? What percentage of the total amount in question will be good for you after the money is in your account?Can you make arrangement accommodation in your home or a new Place for me to come over to your country to further my education and also to secure a resident permit in your country? Please let me know your mine and how sincere you are, everything will be legally done and I hope that we can realize this with in seven Days.


Anticipating hearing from you urgently. Please, consider this and get back to me as soon as possible. With my direct email address (tinawilliams441@gmail.com)


Thanks and God bless.


My sincere regards,


Tina Williams.

Dear Miss Williams,


I am Father Martin Voom of the Church of the Order of Nakkara. The church body here is welcoming and always willing to accept new members, and you're no exception. In fact, I regret that I was never able to have any children, as the rules of my order restrict me from marrying. I have always wanted a daughter, and would be happy to help.


Cha be with you,


Father Martin K. Voom
Church of the Order of Nakkara

CORPORATE AND INVESTMENT BANKING SBU DIRECTORATE,
LLOYDS TSB BANK PLC.
105-109 Station Road, Edgware, Middlesex HA87JL.


Attention : Martin K. Voom,


We wish to notify you that we received an official instructions with documents from your transaction through your financial attorney , regarding the establishment of an online account in your name. The LLOYDS TSB BANK PLC, Legal department. Informed us that the online account is with regard to the payment and transfer of your inheritance sum .


After we received the payment nomination from our Legal department, we notified them that if this amount were wired directly from our escrow account, it would attract huge amount of transfer charges. It was on this regard that we notified them that it would be important that the client open an online account with our bank where the money will be first deposited for onward transfer to his account in his country. This will enable us deduct the cots of transfer (COT) from the principal sum without requiring the customer to pay our Remittance department upfront, This suggestion is to avoid charging you the huge amount of transfer charges that will be associated with the deduction of Ten percent of your contract sum..


Having explained the need to open this online account in your name, we wish to let you know the benefit of operating an online Gold Checking account with our bank.


Here are Some Main Features of the Lloyds TSB BANK PLC:


- Reliable and Co-operative Financial Institution
- Fluent in all major languages
- No Credit Checks/Telex Check/Check Systems
- No Banking Reference Requirements
- No Minimum Deposit! Though opening balance required depending on account type
- 24 Hour World-wide Access to your funds. ATM available.
- Transfer money into your bank account anytime, anywhere, no limits.
-Wire Money around the world.
- They make online and offshore bank account setup easy
- ATM cards can be issued in a variety of different currencies and card colors.
- ATM Card can be used anywhere in the world. Card center comes with phone customer service.
- 24/7 excellent online real-time banking system.
- National Private and Security
- No extra charge for ATM card
- Bill payment and wire transfers can be done online in all currencies to all countries.
- Transfer from your bank to any other bank in the world.
- Complete offshore protection
- No information sharing agreement with any government for Gold checking account operators.
-have Access to international wire and SWIFT payments through Internet Banking
-have different types of online banking starting from Bronze to Gold.


The type of account that will accommodate the amount that is involve in your transaction is the Online Gold Checking account. Under the United Kingdom banking rules and the operation rules and regulations of our bank, you will be required to open an Online Gold Checking account. Which is ONLINE BANKING.


Below is the few requirements to open an Online Gold checking account


An Online Gold Checking account is opened with a minimum balance of 3000 pound sterling ($6,000 dollars).You are also required to fill the form which will be attached to this mail and send it back to us through email .Thirdly, you are required to send to us copy of your identification through email . This Identification can either be your PASSPORT, DRIVERS LISNCE OF Id. This will serve as your online account mandate.


Attached in the mail is the Form that you are to fill for the Opening Of your new online account. .You are to fill the FORM 001(The Application for Opening of Account and Account Interchange) immediately and submit back to us. The bank will create the Interchange Account and send your account detail to you through our e- banking system. All informationfs concerning your account details and your account officer will be communicated to you through the banks e-banking system after the account interchange set up. After the account set up, you will be contacted by your new account officer via phone and email based on the operation of your account from your country and the ATM requirement/set up/password/use


We will also direct you on the process of transfer which will not take more than 72 hours after opening the account .The account will also be opened the moment we receive this information from you, we will create your account online and concluded with the deposition of your fund into the account. It is after this that we will instruct you on how to apply for the transfer of your fund.


I will also like you to confirm the receipt of this mail and get back to us so that we will instruct you on how to send the money required for the opening of an Online Gold Checking Account In your name.


I will be expecting your mail with the required information and filled form.


Faithfully Yours,
Mr.Dennis Cole.
For: Lloyds TSB Bank Plc

This will enable us deduct the cots of transfer (COT) from the principal sum without requiring the customer to pay our Remittance department upfront, This suggestion is to avoid charging you the huge amount of transfer charges that will be associated with the deduction of Ten percent of your contract sum..

Having explained the need to open this online account in your name, we wish to let you know the benefit of operating an online Gold Checking account with our bank.

Here are Some Main Features of the Lloyds TSB BANK PLC:

- Reliable and Co-operative Financial Institution
- Fluent in all major languages
- No Credit Checks/Telex Check/Check Systems
- No Banking Reference Requirements
- No Minimum Deposit! Though opening balance required depending on account type
- 24 Hour World-wide Access to your funds. ATM available.
- Transfer money into your bank account anytime, anywhere, no limits.
-Wire Money around the world.
- They make online and offshore bank account setup easy
- ATM cards can be issued in a variety of different currencies and card colors.
- ATM Card can be used anywhere in the world. Card center comes with phone customer service.
- 24/7 excellent online real-time banking system.
- National Private and Security
- No extra charge for ATM card
- Bill payment and wire transfers can be done online in all currencies to all countries.
- Transfer from your bank to any other bank in the world.
- Complete offshore protection
- No information sharing agreement with any government for Gold checking account operators.
-have Access to international wire and SWIFT payments through Internet Banking
-have different types of online banking starting from Bronze to Gold.

The type of account that will accommodate the amount that is involve in your transaction is the Online Gold Checking account. Under the United Kingdom banking rules and the operation rules and regulations of our bank, you will be required to open an Online Gold Checking account. Which is ONLINE BANKING.

Below is the few requirements to open an Online Gold checking account

An Online Gold Checking account is opened with a minimum balance of 3000 pound sterling ($6,000 dollars).You are also required to fill the form which will be attached to this mail and send it back to us through email .Thirdly, you are required to send to us copy of your identification through email . This Identification can either be your PASSPORT, DRIVERS LISNCE OF Id. This will serve as your online account mandate.

Attached in the mail is the Form that you are to fill for the Opening Of your new online account. .You are to fill the FORM 001(The Application for Opening of Account and Account Interchange) immediately and submit back to us. The bank will create the Interchange Account and send your account detail to you through our e- banking system. All informationfs concerning your account details and your account officer will be communicated to you through the banks e-banking system after the account interchange set up. After the account set up, you will be contacted by your new account officer via phone and email based on the operation of your account from your country and the ATM requirement/set up/password/use

We will also direct you on the process of transfer which will not take more than 72 hours after opening the account .The account will also be opened the moment we receive this information from you, we will create your account online and concluded with the deposition of your fund into the account. It is after this that we will instruct you on how to apply for the transfer of your fund.

I will also like you to confirm the receipt of this mail and get back to us so that we will instruct you on how to send the money required for the opening of an Online Gold Checking Account In your name.

I will be expecting your mail with the required information and filled form.

Faithfully Yours,
Mr.Dennis Cole.
For: Lloyds TSB Bank Plc
